glasses.name: Luigi colorless
glasses.description: Stylish and professional, these sunglasses feature a sleek design and UV-protected lenses, making them perfect for meetings and formal occasions. Their lightweight comfort and refined look seamlessly complement business attire.

glasses.name: Mosa Black
glasses.description: Trendy and versatile, these sunglasses add a touch of charm to any casual or romantic outing. With comfortable frames and UV-protected lenses, they’re perfect for sunny hangouts or stylish date nights.

glasses.name: Anarchy Gold Black
glasses.description: Designed for sunny adventures, these sunglasses feature polarized lenses for glare reduction and UV protection. Their lightweight, water-friendly design makes them perfect for relaxing by the beach or pool in style.

glasses.name: Vertigo Pink
glasses.description: Add a touch of sophistication to your look with these stylish sunglasses. Featuring a chic design and UV-protected lenses, they’re perfect for enhancing your charm during casual outings or romantic dates.

glasses.name: Celine Mosa Brown
glasses.description: Refined and practical, these sunglasses feature a timeless design that pairs perfectly with business attire. Lightweight and UV-protected, they’re ideal for meetings, workdays, and formal events.

glasses.name: Pearl Guan Gold
glasses.description: Stay stylish under the sun with these trendy sunglasses. Designed for comfort and UV protection, they’re perfect for relaxing by the beach or poolside in elegance.

glasses.name: cutie blue
glasses.description: Designed for style and safety, these sunglasses feature UV-protected lenses and a durable, lightweight frame. Perfect for keeping little eyes shielded during outdoor adventures!

glasses.name: fly orange black
glasses.description: Keep your kids cool and protected with these vibrant sunglasses. Built with UV protection and a kid-friendly, durable design, they’re perfect for sunny playdays and adventures!
